channel.title: Why RStreams? on RStreams
channel.description: Recent content in Why RStreams? on RStreams

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: RStreams is a server-side bus installed in an AWS account and an SDK for creating reactive applications that use the bus and a monitoring web app called Botmon. RStreams Flow is an opinionated framework to make getting a client-side project up and running super easy.
